DRAGON_FLAGON.Nav_SettingOnClickHint: When a scene is clicked in the sidebar, it is navigated to (Always true for players). UPDATES ON NEXT SCENE CHANGE
DRAGON_FLAGON.Nav_SettingOnClickPCHint: (requires refresh) Allow players to use the Scenes Tab to perform navigation.
DRAGON_FLAGON.Nav_SettingOnClickJournal: Navigate when a Scene reference is clicked in a Journal
DRAGON_FLAGON.Nav_SettingOnClickJournalH: If a Journal Entry contains a Scene link, clicking it will allow you to navigate to that Scene.
DRAGON_FLAGON.Nav_SettingOnClickJournalO: Execute Scene Link immediately if only one option is available
If only one option is available, don't display the dialog and just execute the action immediately.
DRAGON_FLAGON.Dialog_JournalMessage: How would you like to open this Scene?
